Actions.Name: Add rows to a dataset
Actions.Description: Use Power BI REST API to add rows to a dataset.

Actions.Name: When a data driven alert is triggered
Actions.Description: Return the details of the specified data driven alert from Power BI when the alert triggered.

Actions.Name: Create a goal (Preview)
Actions.Description: Creates a Power BI goal on the specified scorecard.

Actions.Name: Create a scorecard (Preview)
Actions.Description: Creates a scorecard for Power BI goals.

Actions.Name: Get a goal (Preview)
Actions.Description: Gets the specified Power BI goal on a scorecard.

Actions.Name: Get a goal check-in (Preview)
Actions.Description: Get a check-in on a Power BI goal.

Actions.Name: Get goal check-ins (Preview)
Actions.Description: Get all check-ins on a Power BI goal.

Actions.Name: Get multiple goals (Preview)
Actions.Description: Get a list of Power BI goals in the specified scorecard.

Actions.Name: Get scorecards (Preview)
Actions.Description: Gets a list of Power BI scorecards in the specified workspace.

Actions.Name: When a goal changes (Preview)
Actions.Description: When a property of some Power BI goal changes.

Actions.Name: When a data refresh for a goal fails (Preview)
Actions.Description: When a data refresh for a Power BI goal fails.

Actions.Name: When someone assigns a new owner to a goal (Preview)
Actions.Description: When someone assigns a new owner to a Power BI goal.

Actions.Name: When status of a goal changes (Preview)
Actions.Description: When status of some Power BI goal changes.

Actions.Name: When current value of a goal changes (Preview)
Actions.Description: When current value of some Power BI goal changes.

Actions.Name: Create a check-in (Preview)
Actions.Description: Creates a Power BI goal check-in.

Actions.Name: Add a note to a check-in (Preview)
Actions.Description: Appends a new note to a check-in of a Power BI goal.

Actions.Name: When someone adds or edits a goal check-in (Preview)
Actions.Description: Trigger for some Power BI goal check-in or note changes.

Actions.Name: Export To File for Paginated Reports
Actions.Description: Use Power BI Rest API to inititate export for paginated reports

Actions.Name: Export To File for Power BI Reports
Actions.Description: Use Power BI Rest API to inititate export for Power BI reports

Actions.Name: Power BI button clicked
Actions.Description: This trigger allows you to run a flow when a Power BI button is clicked. (Available only for Power Automate.)

Actions.Name: Refresh a dataset
Actions.Description: Use Power BI REST API to refresh a powerbi dataset.

Actions.Name: Update a goal (Preview)
Actions.Description: Updates the Power BI goal's state.

Actions.Name: Update a check-in (Preview)
Actions.Description: Updates a Power BI goal check-in.
